mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tpl_fram_order_t ( order_no, product_id, product_name, product_type, order_amount, order_time, pay_time, order_status, refund_amount, refund_time, refund_status, pay_type, pay_source, pay_by, buy_num, transaction_id, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME,UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{refundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{refundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{currentUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{currentUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
